abstract: European Central Bank official Sabine Lautenschlager of Germany says she opposes extension of its economic stimulus campaign, revealing rare public rift within organization.
lead_paragraph: A rare public rift emerged at the European Central Bank as a major policy setter opposed an extension of its economic stimulus campaign days after the bank’s leader paved the way for more.

headline.main: A Rift at the European Central Bank Over Stimulus
headline.print_headline: European Bank Executive Opposes Extending Stimulus

snippet: A rare public rift emerged at the European Central Bank as a major policy setter opposed an extension of its economic stimulus campaign days after the bank’s leader paved the way for more.
